name: Gulliver Mickey
summary: Mickey is looking after the orphans. He tells them the story of Gulliver (with Mickey in that role) in Lilliput, though without the satire and bawdy bits. The story ends with Mickey fighting a giant spider, about twice his size. Written by Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
info:
